#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lli long long
#define pb push_back

double f(double x,int n){
    double ans = x;
    double t = (double)(x)/100;
    double tmp = pow(t,(double)n);
    tmp = (double)1-tmp;
    ans *= tmp;
    return ans;
}

double ternary(int n){
    double l = 0,r=100;
    for(int i=0; i<1000; i++) {
        double l1 = (l*2.0+r)/3.0;
        double l2 = (l+2.0*r)/3.0;
        if(f(l1,n) > f(l2,n))
            r = l2;
        else l = l1;
    }
    return l;
}

int main(){
    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    //freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        double res = ternary(n);
        printf("%.10lf\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
